snippet: Robert Wolf, formerly a top rainmaker for UBS, has hired Austan Goolsbee as an adviser for his new firm, 32 Advisors, uniting two men with close ties to President Obama.
abstract: Robert Wolf, formerly a top rainmaker for UBS, has hired Austan Goolsbee as an adviser for his new firm, 32 Advisors, uniting two men with close ties to President Obama.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Robert Wolf Said to Hire Goolsbee as Adviser for His Firm
